pkgmetadata.longdescription:
emacs-ycmd is a client for ycmd, the code completion system.
For (C-c Y <cmd>) key bindings see, https://github.com/abingham/emacs-ycmd/blob/master/ycmd.el#L610

use.flag: Adds basic support for in-place completion.
